comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I'll be there and I'll try to remember the camera. I don't think we have any good shots of SuperFlag yet. An aside: saw a CNN headline this morning reading "Mom admits coaching kids to fake retardation." Surprised to see that it _wasn't_ Barbara Bush. Interesting.

comments.author: Eric
comments.body: So who's the favorite author?? We know it's not Derrida because he's dead...but still very quotable. Brian and Eric
